segments.text: I want to give our kitchen the works .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why ? I think it ’ s convenient and good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . The decoration has been out-of-date . My friends have a whole kitchen now . It ’ s modern .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why should we run after the fashion ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am not running after the fashion . I just want a very beautiful and clean kitchen .
segments.speaker: S1
